attributes.action: establish a sound system of support and emergency services to assist and protect victims who make a stand against crime and anti-social behaviour
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to see a specific system established to support victims of crime, anti-social behaviour, domestic violence etc. A system that should include practical mechanisms such as counselling, on-hand medical services, police representation, housing advisors and legal services, under one roof, with the added facility to provide short term emergency accommodation
